org.radarbase.auth.authorization

Class Permission

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.radarbase.auth.authorization.Permission

  • public class Permission
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent the different permissions in the RADAR platform. A permission has an entity and an operation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Permission

        public Permission(Permission.Entity entity,
                  Permission.Operation operation)
        Permission constructor. In general, the constants in this class should be preferred for referencing permissions.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity that the permission refers to.
        operation - the operation on given entity that requires a permission.

    • Method Detail

      • isAuthorityAllowed

        public boolean isAuthorityAllowed(java.lang.String authority)
        Check if a given authority has this permission associated with it.
        Parameters:
        authority - the authority name
        Returns:
        true if the given authority has this permission associated with it, false otherwise

      • allPermissions

        public static java.util.List<Permission> allPermissions()
        Get all currently defined permissions.
        Returns:
        A list containing all currently defined permissions

        public java.lang.String scopeName()
